qualities.name: Damaged
qualities.description: Slightly broken or chipped, lowering its overall worth.

qualities.name: Good
qualities.description: A standard, unadorned item with no added value.

qualities.name: Well-Crafted
qualities.description: Carefully made with attention to detail, adding some value.

qualities.name: Ornate
qualities.description: Decorated with intricate designs or patterns, enhancing its worth.

qualities.name: Exquisite
qualities.description: A masterpiece of craftsmanship, doubling the item's value.

qualities.name: Pristine
qualities.description: In perfect condition, as if newly made, greatly increasing value.

qualities.name: Magical
qualities.description: Enchanted or imbued with magical properties, making it extremely valuable.

qualities.name: Legendary
qualities.description: A one-of-a-kind item with immense historical or magical significance.
